body_html:
thank you for the kindly reply, actually I was running tf-cnn-benchmark downloaded there. nv_peer_memory has been installed.
My OS Platform and Distribution is Centos 7.1
My tensorflow is installed from master banch which version is 1.4.0
Bazel version is 0.7.0
CUDA/cuDNN are 8.0 and 6.0
GPU mode is K40c GPU and memory is 11439MiB

I also try grpc+verbs mode and it runs fine.

body:
thank you for the kindly reply, actually I was running tf-cnn-benchmark downloaded [there](https://github.com/tensorflow/benchmarks). nv_peer_memory has been installed.
My OS Platform and Distribution is Centos 7.1
My tensorflow is installed from master banch which version is 1.4.0
Bazel version is 0.7.0
CUDA/cuDNN are 8.0 and 6.0
GPU mode is K40c GPU and memory is 11439MiB

I also try grpc+verbs mode and it runs fine.
